entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
